scripts.install-all: npm install && concurrently "npm install --prefix ./app/client-react" "npm install --prefix ./app/db-postgresql" "npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently "node --env-file ./app/db-postgresql/.env index" "npm run start-db" "npm run start-client"
scripts.dev: concurrently "node --env-file ./app/db-postgresql/.env --watch index" "npm run start-db" "npm run start-client"
